tidbits.title: Rich Maya Heritage
tidbits.description: Honduras preserves a rich Maya heritage with archaeological sites like Cop√°n, showcasing magnificent ruins and hieroglyphic stairway inscriptions.

tidbits.title: Diverse Natural Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse natural landscapes, including tropical rainforests, Caribbean beaches, and the stunning Bay Islands' coral reefs.

tidbits.title: Coffee Culture
tidbits.description: Honduras is renowned for its coffee production, offering specialty beans and a coffee culture that contributes significantly to its economy.
